titleStmt.title: The Kings right briefely set downe in a sermon preached before the reuerend iudges at the assizes held in Reading for the county of Berks. Iune 28. 1619. By William Dickinson one of the fellowes of Merton Colledge in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Dickinson, William, b. 1584 or 5.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
